memberdef.argsstring: (short *S, vrna_param_t *P)
memberdef.name: get_gquad_matrix

briefdescription.para: Get a triangular matrix prefilled with minimum free energy contributions of G-quadruplexes.

detaileddescription.para: At each position ij in the matrix, the minimum free energy of any G-quadruplex delimited by i and j is stored. If no G-quadruplex formation is possible, the matrix element is set to INF. Access the elements in the matrix via matrix[indx[j]+i]. To get the integer array indx see get_jindx().

parameterdescription.para: The encoded sequence
A pointer to the data structure containing the precomputed energy contributions

simplesect.para: A pointer to the G-quadruplex contribution matrix

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *struc, int *L, int l[3])
memberdef.name: parse_gquad

detaileddescription.para: given a dot-bracket structure (possibly) containing gquads encoded by '+' signs, find first gquad, return end position or 0 if none found Upon return L and l[] contain the number of stacked layers, as well as the lengths of the linker regions. To parse a string with many gquads, call parse_gquad repeatedly e.g. end1 = parse_gquad(struc, &L, l); ... ; end2 = parse_gquad(struc+end1, &L, l); end2+=end1; ... ; end3 = parse_gquad(struc+end2, &L, l); end3+=end2; ... ;

memberdef.argsstring: (int c, int i, int j, int type, short *S, int *ggg, int *index, int *p, int *q, vrna_param_t *P)
memberdef.name: backtrack_GQuad_IntLoop

detaileddescription.para: backtrack an interior loop like enclosed g-quadruplex with closing pair (i,j)

parameterdescription.para: The total contribution the loop should resemble
position i of enclosing pair
position j of enclosing pair
base pair type of enclosing pair (must be reverse type)
integer encoded sequence
triangular matrix containing g-quadruplex contributions
the index for accessing the triangular matrix
here the 5' position of the gquad is stored
here the 3' position of the gquad is stored
the datastructure containing the precalculated contibutions

simplesect.para: 1 on success, 0 if no gquad found
